structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.text:
For the purposes of this chapter, the following words shall have the following meanings:
"County ordinance" means (a) an official written act of a fiscal court, the effect of which is general and lasting in nature, which is enforceable within the jurisdiction of the county; or (b) a lawful appropriation of money.
"Summary" means a concise written narrative covering the main points of any official statement, certified as to its accuracy by the fiscal court and written in a way calculated to inform the public clearly of its contents. Summaries may be written for but are not limited to resolutions and ordinances.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978.
